text: William Tulloch Paterson (born 3 June 1945) is a Scottish actor and commentator. He has appeared in many movies and television projects including Comfort and Joy (1984), Truly, Madly, Deeply (1990), Wives and Daughters (1999), Sea of Souls (2004â€“2007), Amazing Grace (2006), Miss Potter (2006), and PBS's Little Dorrit (2008). ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Playback/Law & Order Images of Bill Paterson Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Glasgow Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors
title: Bill Paterson
